Subject: Battle in South Africa (Complete Version)
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

From: KSLawdogg@...

(Sorry about the half-done e-mail, my server, CS, freaked out when I was 
writing the e-mail and it sent th e-mail before I was done with it, here's 
the full version of it)


Oblitertron (gestalt)/Dark Wolf (gestalt)/Defensor (gestalt)/Sixshot/Double 
Punch/Injector/Manterror/Bumblebee/Beeline/Ares/Nemesis 
Enforcer/Scattershot/Sun 
Crusher/Reflector/Chordate:




Oblitertron continued his charge, when two rockets from a missile launcher 
exploded against the back of a knee, the mercenary gestalt tumbling forward.  
As a result of this, a bolt from Defensor's rifle missed Oblitertron, and the 
Alliance gestalt slammed into Defensor's legs.

---

Defensor tumbled to the ground as Oblitertron hit him down in the legs, the 
Maximal gestalt falling on top of him.  He'd lost a hold of his rifle, but 
got a giant fist around Oblitertron's neck, squeezing as hard as he could 
while his other fist started socking his opponent in the a forehead 
repeatedly.

---

Dark Wolf turned away from the smoldering remains of the missile launcher he 
had destroyed (in previous post), and raised an arm, a bolt of laser energy 
erupting from the palm of his hand at Silverbolt, the Maximal's movement 
catching his attention.

---

Sixshot tried to maneuver, firing three optic blasts, only one intercepting 
an oncoming missile, the other of Sky Lynx's missile exploding against his 
chest, sending him flipping backwards in the sky.  He cursed, regaining his 
hover, and fired off three blasts from both of his hypersonic concussion 
blasters at Sky Lynx.

---

Double Punch watched Beeline for a moment as it intercepted the missiles.  He 
ran to the left as hard as he could, the charges missing him, but three shots 
striking him in the right shoulder.  He raised both arms, launching two 
energy-signature seeking missilesf rom his left pincher at Torca, and another 
two at Ratchet from the other.

---

Injector raised his stinger, hovering in his beast mode, firing down two 
stinger missiles at Grimmler.

---

Manterror raised his left arm, firing off four ion disks, intercepting the 
oncoming missile with one and five shots with the second, the two others 
going for Ratchet.

The ten shots struck Manterror's armored exo-skeleton and he let out a 
barrage of curses, lowering his right arm and firing off three ion disks down 
at Chordate.

---

Bumblebee flew down, avoiding eight shots and a tusk missile, the rest of the 
shots sent him spinning through the air.

---

Sun Crusher grunted in pain as the two missiles collided with him, sending 
him slamming on his back.  Laying on the ground, he raised his rifle, firing 
off three bolts up at Sky Lynx, followed by five rapid optic blasts.

---

Reflector flew backwards in the air from the explosions of Torca's shells, 
and returned fire with three bolts from his laser rifle at the Maximal's left 
knee.

---

Ares rolled out of the way of the missile and some of the shots, his armor 
taking damage from the shots.  He raised his weapon, firing off a grenade at 
Sideswipe.

---

Nemesis Enforcer laughed at Iron Raptor, seeing her not even return fire.  
"Fool..." he laughed, raising the missile launcher in his arms.  He fired off 
a rocket from the weapon of war down at the femal Maximal leader, the 
kickback from the weapon sending him back in the air a foot.  "TAKE THAT YOU 
SLAG SUCKING PIECE OF TRASH!"

---

Scattershot dived downward, firing off 10 armor-piercing rounds down at Iron 
Raptor's left knee.  "To be precise, is to be precise.  So DarkStorm says, 
and so says Soundwave's dead corpse!" he laughed, trying to decide the next 
course of action against his female enemy down below him.

==

Chordate smiled as he watched Unitron and Firestarter flee. 

-Good- he thought.  -One less problem to worry about-
